data.0:
Organization Name: 
Leaders Furniture 
Department: 
Retail Sales Team 
Reports To: 
Showroom Manager 
Hours/Week: 
Up to 28 Hours Per week 
$10 per hour + Commissions + Accelerator Bonus (training pay 
Starting Salary: 
scale for the first 6 pay periods)

•  401k Retirement Plan 
•  Holidays 
•  Health Insurance 
•  Paid Time Off 
•  Dental Insurance 
•  Employee Discount 
•  Vision Insurance 
 FLSA Status: 
Non-Exempt 
Type: 
Permanent  
 Prepared Date: 
May 13, 2024 
 
 
     Job Purpose 
 
 
Sales Professionals at Leaders Furniture® play a vital in providing a world class customer service experience. Sales 
Professions must strive to perform beyond expectations and in a manner that is consistent with the Company’s 
core values and vision. Leaders Furniture® Sales Professionals promote company policy and procedures, the 
company vision and work with their team in achieving the goals of their location.  
 
     Tasks 
• 
Meet and exceed all KPI sales goals and administrative goals.  
• 
Maximize personal sales volume.  
• 
Maintain 1.25% or higher Fabric Protection and maintain 3.75% or higher delivery sales. 
• 
Assist with the processing of weekly shuttle trucks. 
• 
Seek out and execute contract opportunities and designer relationships.  
• 
Adhere to cash handling and security policies, PCI compliance. 
• 
Report to work on time and complete your full shift. 
• 
Exercise safety always; report all foreseeable hazards within the showroom and on the exterior of the 
building to the Showroom Manager immediately.
